definition: A term used to describe individuals who arouse suspicion due to their behavior, actions, or appearance. It is commonly employed in the context of criminal investigations or when discussing potential threats or wrongdoing.

examples.german: Die Polizei hat den verdächtigen Mann verhaftet.
examples.english: The police arrested the suspicious man.

examples.german: Er wurde verdächtigt, das Verbrechen begangen zu haben.
examples.english: He was suspected of committing the crime.

examples.german: Der verdächtige Gegenstand wurde sicher entfernt.
examples.english: The suspicious object was safely removed.
